testcase.name: User could register with valid data
User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user to login page....................................................passed When user enter valid email.................................................passed And user enter valid password...............................................passed And user click on login.....................................................passed Then user could login successfully and redirected to home page..............passed

testcase.name: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user opened login page................................................passed And user click on reset password............................................passed And user enter his email....................................................passed And user click recover......................................................passed Then user should receive a link to reset password...........................passed

testcase.name: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given user login to his account.............................................passed And user enter name of product at search box................................passed And user click on search....................................................passed Then user could see the product displayed...................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: user can switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to select currency.....................................passed And user select EURO currency...............................................passed Then euro sign should be displayed at website...............................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to select category.....................................passed And user hover on category and select subcategory...........................passed Then the selected category should be displayed..............................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in to filter...........................................passed When user select category...................................................passed And user filter by color....................................................passed Then products with this attribute should be displayed.......................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.name: user can select different tags
